attributes.action: Reassess Schedule 2 to allow men with cardiac and vascular Erectile Dysfunction to receive NHS treatment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently there are too few groups of men who can obtain NHS prescriptions for their Erectile Dysfunction. This should be expanded to groups such as cardio vascular, renal and those who have been assessed by a 'specialist clinic' and are deemed suitable for treatment under this category
